Text.Page:
Those cursed Lokian agitators and their enraged beasts must be stopped before they inflict irreparable harm. You are to kill {@LinkCreature:29#3011#thorntail kamaras}, {@LinkCreature:29#3012#elder thorntails}, {@LinkCreature:29#3021#ghilliedhu wardens}, {@LinkCreature:29#3022#ghilliedhu guardians}, {@LinkCreature:29#4011#Lokian battleragers}, {@LinkCreature:29#4012#Lokian warpriests}, {@LinkCreature:29#4021#Lokian deathreapers}, {@LinkCreature:29#4022#Lokian warmages}, and {@LinkCreature:29#4031#forestwalker vulcans}.

Report to Deirin when mission is complete.
Your hard work and suffering are appreciated. Accept this bounty with our thanks.
Without proof of death, bounty payments aren't authorized.
